languages.text: "Вот когда на сцене появилась Леди Теодора, глава вашей династии. Она... стала своего рода проводником высшей воли". {n}Арджента запинается, подбирая слова.{/n} "От нее я узнала о недавно открытой ее разведчиками планете под названием Салис Прайм. Для Вольного Торговца эта планета представляла лишь небольшой интерес — дикий мир вдалеке от удобных {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-маршрутов. Но для меня... для меня новость стала откровением".

traits.locale_text: "Вот когда на сцене появилась леди Теодора, глава вашей династии. Она... стала своего рода проводником высшей воли". {n}Арджента запинается, подбирая слова.{/n} "От нее я узнала о недавно открытой ее разведчиками планете под названием Салис Прайм. Для Вольного Торговца эта планета представляла лишь небольшой интерес — дикий мир вдалеке от удобных {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-маршрутов. Но для меня... для меня новость стала откровением".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "That was when Lady Theodora, head of your dynasty, appeared. She... became an agent of divine will, in a way." {n}Argenta falters, searching for the words.{/n} "It was from her that I learned about a planet recently discovered by her scouts, Salis Prime. For a Rogue Trader, the planet was of little interest — a feral world away from convenient {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes. But for me... for me, learning about its existence was a revelation."
languages.original_text: "Вот когда на сцене появилась Леди Теодора, глава вашей династии. Она... стала своего рода проводником высшей воли". {n}Арджента запинается, подбирая слова.{/n} "От нее я узнала о недавно открытой ее разведчиками планете под названием Салис Прайм. Для Вольного Торговца эта планета представляла лишь небольшой интерес — дикий мир вдалеке от удобных {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-маршрутов. Но для меня... для меня новость стала откровением".

traits.locale_text: "That was when Lady Theodora, head of your dynasty, appeared on the scene. She... became an agent of divine will, in a way." {n}Argenta falters, searching for words.{/n} "From her I learned about a planet recently discovered by her scouts, Salis Prime. For a Rogue Trader, the planet was of little interest — a feral world away from convenient warp routes. But for me... for me learning about its existence was a revelation."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That was when Lady Theodora, head of your dynasty, appeared on the scene. traits.locale_text: "That was when Lady Theodora, head of your dynasty, appeared. She... became an agent of divine will, in a way." {n}Argenta falters, searching for the words.{/n} "It was from her that I learned about a planet recently discovered by her scouts, Salis Prime. For a Rogue Trader, the planet was of little interest — a feral world away from convenient {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes. But for me... for me, learning about its existence was a revelation."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “就在那个时候，你的王朝的西奥多拉女士出现了。她……在某种意义上，成为了神圣意志的代理人。”{n}阿洁塔有些结巴，努力寻找着合适的词。{/n}“正是从她那里，我了解到了她的斥候最近发现的行星，也就是萨利斯主星。对行商浪人而言，那颗行星没有任何值得注意的地方，不过是个远离{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}航道的蛮荒世界罢了。可对我而言……对我而言，知道了那颗行星的存在，就仿佛某种启示一般。”
languages.original_text: "That was when Lady Theodora, head of your dynasty, appeared. She... became an agent of divine will, in a way." {n}Argenta falters, searching for the words.{/n} "It was from her that I learned about a planet recently discovered by her scouts, Salis Prime. For a Rogue Trader, the planet was of little interest — a feral world away from convenient {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes. But for me... for me, learning about its existence was a revelation."

traits.locale_text: “就在那个时候，你的王朝的西奥多拉女士出现了。她……在某种意义上，成为了神圣意志的代理人。”{n}阿洁塔有些结巴，努力寻找着合适的词。{/n}“正是从她那里，我了解到了她的斥候最近发现的行星，也就是萨利斯主星。对行商浪人而言，那颗行星没有任何值得注意的地方，不过是个远离{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}航道的蛮荒世界罢了。可对我而言……对我而言，知道了那颗行星的存在，就仿佛某种启示一般。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Fue entonces que lady Theodora, la cabeza de su dinastía, hizo acto de presencia. Se... convirtió en agente de la voluntad divina, por así decirlo». {n}Argenta titubea, buscando las palabras adecuadas.{/n} «Fue gracias a ella que supe de un planeta recientemente descubierto por sus exploradores: Salis Prime. Para una Comerciante Independiente, el planeta no ofrecía nada de interés. Era un mundo salvaje y alejado de las grandes rutas que atraviesan la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Pero para mí... descubrir su existencia fue una revelación».
languages.original_text: "That was when Lady Theodora, head of your dynasty, appeared. She... became an agent of divine will, in a way." {n}Argenta falters, searching for the words.{/n} "It was from her that I learned about a planet recently discovered by her scouts, Salis Prime. For a Rogue Trader, the planet was of little interest — a feral world away from convenient {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes. But for me... for me, learning about its existence was a revelation."

traits.locale_text: «Fue entonces que lady Theodora, la cabeza de su dinastía, hizo acto de presencia. Se... convirtió en agente de la voluntad divina, por así decirlo». {n}Argenta titubea, buscando las palabras adecuadas.{/n} «Fue gracias a ella que supe de un planeta recientemente descubierto por sus exploradores: Salis Prime. Para una Comerciante Independiente, el planeta no ofrecía nada de interés. Era un mundo salvaje y alejado de las grandes rutas que atraviesan la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Pero para mí... descubrir su existencia fue una revelación».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「その時、陛下の王朝の支配者であるレディ・シオドーラが現れたのです。彼女は…ある意味、神の意志の代理人だでした」{n}アルジェンタはためらうように、言葉を探して紡ぐ。{/n}「彼女の探索によって最近発見された惑星、サリス・プライムについて知ったのはその時でした。自由開拓者にとって、その惑星はほとんど興味のないものでした…便利な{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}航路から離れた原始惑星だったので。しかし我にとっては…我にとって、その存在を知ることは啓示に等しいものだった」
languages.original_text: "That was when Lady Theodora, head of your dynasty, appeared. She... became an agent of divine will, in a way." {n}Argenta falters, searching for the words.{/n} "It was from her that I learned about a planet recently discovered by her scouts, Salis Prime. For a Rogue Trader, the planet was of little interest — a feral world away from convenient {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes. But for me... for me, learning about its existence was a revelation."

traits.locale_text: 「その時、陛下の王朝の支配者であるレディ・シオドーラが現れたのです。彼女は…ある意味、神の意志の代理人だでした」{n}アルジェンタはためらうように、言葉を探して紡ぐ。{/n}「彼女の探索によって最近発見された惑星、サリス・プライムについて知ったのはその時でした。自由開拓者にとって、その惑星はほとんど興味のないものでした…便利な{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}航路から離れた原始惑星だったので。しかし我にとっては…我にとって、その存在を知ることは啓示に等しいものだった」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Und dann erschien Lady Theodora, die Anführerin Eurer Dynastie. Sie ... wurde sozusagen zur Überbringerin des göttlichen Willens." {n}Argenta bricht ab und sucht nach den richtigen Worten.{/n} "Von ihr erfuhr ich von einem Planeten, den ihre Späher kürzlich entdeckt hatten: Salis Prime. Für eine Freihändlerin war er kaum von Interesse – eine Urzeitwelt, fernab der gängigen {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Routen. Aber für mich ... für mich war es eine Offenbarung, von seiner Existenz zu erfahren."
languages.original_text: "That was when Lady Theodora, head of your dynasty, appeared. She... became an agent of divine will, in a way." {n}Argenta falters, searching for the words.{/n} "It was from her that I learned about a planet recently discovered by her scouts, Salis Prime. For a Rogue Trader, the planet was of little interest — a feral world away from convenient {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes. But for me... for me, learning about its existence was a revelation."

traits.locale_text: "Und dann erschien Lady Theodora, die Anführerin Eurer Dynastie. Sie ... wurde sozusagen zur Überbringerin des göttlichen Willens." {n}Argenta bricht ab und sucht nach den richtigen Worten.{/n} "Von ihr erfuhr ich von einem Planeten, den ihre Späher kürzlich entdeckt hatten: Salis Prime. Für eine Freihändlerin war er kaum von Interesse – eine Urzeitwelt, fernab der gängigen {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Routen. Aber für mich ... für mich war es eine Offenbarung, von seiner Existenz zu erfahren."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est alors que j'ai rencontré dame Théodora, la chef de votre dynastie. Elle est... devenue un agent de la volonté divine, d'une certaine manière. » {n}Argenta hésite, cherchant ses mots.{/n} « C'est elle qui m'a parlé de Salis Primus, une planète récemment découverte par ses éclaireurs. Pour une libre-marchande, ce monde sauvage à l'écart des routes {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} les plus pratiques ne présentait guère d'intérêt. Pour moi, en revanche... ce fut une révélation. »
languages.original_text: "That was when Lady Theodora, head of your dynasty, appeared. She... became an agent of divine will, in a way." {n}Argenta falters, searching for the words.{/n} "It was from her that I learned about a planet recently discovered by her scouts, Salis Prime. For a Rogue Trader, the planet was of little interest — a feral world away from convenient {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes. But for me... for me, learning about its existence was a revelation."

traits.locale_text: « C'est alors que j'ai rencontré dame Théodora, la chef de votre dynastie. Elle est... devenue un agent de la volonté divine, d'une certaine manière. » {n}Argenta hésite, cherchant ses mots.{/n} « C'est elle qui m'a parlé de Salis Primus, une planète récemment découverte par ses éclaireurs. Pour une libre-marchande, ce monde sauvage à l'écart des routes {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} les plus pratiques ne présentait guère d'intérêt. Pour moi, en revanche... ce fut une révélation. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hanedanlığının başı Leydi Theodora, tam da bu dönemde ortaya çıktı. Kendisini... İmparator gönderdi diyebilirim." {n}Argenta'nın sesi alçalıyor, belli ki doğru kelimeleri seçmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Keşif birliklerinin yeni bir gezegen keşfettiğini bizzat kendisinden öğrendim. Salis Prime adlı bu gezegen, bir Hür Tacir için önem arz etmiyordu. İşlevsel {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} rotalarından uzakta yer alan, vahşi bir dünyaydı. Ancak buranın keşfi benim için... Benim için bir tür aydınlanmaydı."
languages.original_text: "That was when Lady Theodora, head of your dynasty, appeared. She... became an agent of divine will, in a way." {n}Argenta falters, searching for the words.{/n} "It was from her that I learned about a planet recently discovered by her scouts, Salis Prime. For a Rogue Trader, the planet was of little interest — a feral world away from convenient {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes. But for me... for me, learning about its existence was a revelation."

traits.locale_text: "Hanedanlığının lideri Leydi Theodora, tam da bu dönemde ortaya çıktı. Kendisi… İlahi iradenin bir hizmetkârı olmuştu diyebilirim." {n}Argenta'nın sesi alçalıyor, belli ki doğru kelimeleri seçmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Keşif birliklerinin yeni bir gezegen keşfettiğini bizzat kendisinden öğrendim. Bu gezegen Salis Prime'dı ve bir Hür Tacir için önem arz etmiyordu. İşlevsel {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} rotalarından uzakta yer alan, vahşi bir dünyaydı bu. Ancak benim için… Buranın varlığını keşfetmek, benim için bir tür aydınlanmaydı."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
